caption.title: Model validation using the first synthetic dataset.
caption.p:
Posterior estimates for the incidence rate and population susceptibility (A), basic reproductive number R
0 (B), infectious period (C), immunity period (D), and strength of cross-immunity (E), compared to the true values. In (A) and (B), dots show the true incidence rates (in black; right y-axis), susceptibility (in blue; left y-axis), and R
0 (in blue; left y-axis); the lines and surrounding areas show the mean and 95% credible interval (CI) estimates. In (A), vertical dashed black lines show the true weeks with punctuated antigenic changes and red lines show model-estimates. In (C)-(E), red stars show true parameter values; box plots show the median, 75%, and 95% CIs of posterior estimates by the model-inference system; orange dashed lines show the prior ranges tested.
Click here for additional data file.
